display_long_description:
# 🏍 Off Track VR – Ride. Stunt. Explore. Together.

Off Track VR is a physics based VR riding sandbox built for freedom.

Now featuring full-body multiplayer, voice chat, custom lobbies, and quick join, you can ride, stunt, race, or just chill with players from around the world.


# 🌍 **14 Open Maps**: 
Explore a growing world of diverse environments, each built with unique terrain styles and layouts. All maps continue to evolve with ongoing updates and community feedback.


# 🛞 **7 Free Rideable Bikes**

Each bike offers a different feel, weight, and riding style:
- 🏍 Dirt Bikes – light and responsive
- 🧗 Trial Bike – precision and balance
- 🔥 Super Moto – fast and grippy
- 🛵 Scooter – playful and smooth
- 🧭 Adventure Bike – built for distance
- 🛻 ATV (4-Wheeler) – stable and powerful


# 🔥 **Off Track Pro Line**
Upgrade your garage with the Pro Line featuring:
- 6 additional bikes
- Expanded riding styles


# **🚙 Special Off-Road Vehicles**
Not just bikes.
- Off Road Buggy 
- GoKart


# **🎮 Multiplayer & Social Riding**
- Full-body VR avatars
- Multiplayer sessions
- Voice chat
- Custom rooms & lobby system


# **🏍  Built for Skill and Freedom**

• Physics-based riding
• Freestyle sandbox gameplay
• Open world environments
• Continuous content updates

Master throttle control, balance, jumps, and terrain adaptation. Whether you're flowing through open roads or testing yourself on technical sections, Off Track VR rewards skill and creativity.

🔥 More Coming Soon
